role_description: An Ansible role that installs Windows Admin Center on Windows 10
role_description_full_overview: [Windows Admin Center](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/windows-admin-center) was unveiled by Microsoft on September 14, 2017 as the necessary evolution of the Windows Server graphical user interface. Windows Admin Center offers a flexible, locally-deployed, browser-based management platform and tools. The idea behind this project is to help simplify the management of servers by placing a majority of the frequently referenced tools used by system administrators in one spot. You can run it on both Windows 10 and Windows Server.
